text: Rhydyfelin Rugby Football Club is a Welsh rugby union team based in Rhydyfelin. Rhydyfelin RFC is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union, Rhondda & East Glamorgan district, Mid District C and is a feeder club for the Cardiff Blues. ==Club badge== The present club badge is based on a shield design split into quarters. The four sections of the badge represent the Glamorgan Chevrons, the former round houses of Rhydyfelin, the old tin works of Rhydyfelin and the old viaduct that once ran through the village.clubHouse website. Sourced 17th Aug 2007 == Honours== * 2016/17 Division One East - Champions ==Notes== Category:Rugby clubs established in 1905 Category:Welsh rugby union teams Category:1905 establishments in Wales
title: Rhydyfelin RFC
